Silly Vidz

A responsive video gallery to watch funny videos I've found around the web
designed by Nikolas Smith and created primarily for Hayley's sake!

Learn More

Nathan For You (Season 1 - Ep. 3) - "Clothing Store / Restaurant"

Nathan tries to help promote a clothing store by allowing "attractive" customers to shoplift a single item, if they promise to promote the store to a friend; Nathan helps a restaurant by making its bathrooms available for anyone to use, whilst using them to promote the restaurant.

Watch

Nathan For You (Season 1 - Ep. 4) - "Gas Station / Caricature Artist"

Nathan offers a rebate at a gas station that is extremely difficult (but not impossible) to claim; Nathan helps a fledgling caricature artist by encouraging him to draw offensive images of beach passerby.

Watch

Nathan For You (Season 1 - Ep. 5) - "Haunted House / The Hunk"

Nathan makes a haunted house scarier by convincing visitors that they had contracted an airborne disease; Nathan tries to become less awkward around women by dating several of them at once on a fake reality show.

Watch

Nathan For You (Season 2 - Ep. 1) - "Mechanic / Realtor"

Nathan works with an auto mechanic by allowing customers to ask for realistic pricing estimates; Nathan tries to rebrand a realtor as the ghost realtor, who guarantees that all of the properties that she sells are ghost-free.

Watch

Nathan For You (Season 2 - Ep. 8) - "Toy Company / Movie Theatre"

Nathan shows a toy company how to market to children; a movie theater implements a no-sharing policy; Nathan tries to get a security guard from season one his own reality TV show.

Watch

Nathan Fielder's Run-in with Police via Jimmy Kimmel

Nathan talks about the new season of his show 'Nathan for You,' and reveals a crazy story about switched luggage and the police while traveling for a wedding.

Watch

But Why?

I got sick of needing to look around to find stuff, so I decided to build this site to keep it all in one place. I'll update it as time goes forward. For now, enjoy!
